content:
<rule id="embedded-framework-08600" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="{*}.{extensions}" pattern="{prefixes}flo-editor"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Boot Flo">
                    <description>The application embeds Spring Boot Flo.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Boot Flo</technology-tag>
            </perform>
            <where param="prefixes">
                <matches pattern="(<|')"/>
             </where>
             <where param="extensions">
                 <matches pattern="(html|ts)"/>
             </where>
        </rule>
